original_title: Rolando Romero vs. Ismael Barroso: WBA Super Lightweight Championship
overview: Popular hard-hitting super lightweight contender Rolando “Rolly” Romero takes on veteran southpaw Ismael Barroso for the interim title inside The Cosmopolitan of Las Vegas.
title: Rolando Romero vs. Ismael Barroso: WBA Super Lightweight Championship
